page.title: 10LUNAN AREA, EMPLOYMENT.
page.content: Agriculture provides the main employment in this area, though since farm mechanisation fewer full time farm workers are required. At the same time they have to be of a high standard and able to cope with the new machinary. Women and school children can find part time agricultural employment at potato harvest and fruit picking time. Salmon fishing also offers employment though this is mostly seasonal. The Tourist Industry. The Lunan Bay hotel also employ a small number of men and women throughout the year. Many of the indigenous population commute to work in the nearby towns. Although there is little unemployment in this area, redundancy and whether there will be work for school leavers appears to be a great worry in 1985.
